page.title: 08One day in the life of Lucy.
page.content: On Saturday I play outside if it's not raining .I play with our rabbit and I climb trees.My mum usually does the shopping on Friday after her work. When it's raining I usually draw pictures or read books .Last Saturday we went to Aberystwyth to get some sandals .We looked in lots of shops but in the end we found some.In the morning I get up and dress,go down and have breakfast.After breakfast I go to feed our rabbit.I give him grass,lettuce,bread and fresh water to drink.After that I draw if it's raining and stay outside if it isn't.I'm not usually allowed inside if it's nice weather because my mum and dad want to clean the house.at two o'clock I have lunch because the cleaning takes so long.After lunch I am allowed to go in.Sometimes we go for a trip.Then I have my tea.
